MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the CW3 and CW5 postcode areas of Crewe and Nantwich affecting a number of properties in the local area. Our emergency response team has managed to restore power to a number of properties, and we are working to restore power for those customers still off supply. Repairs are taking longer than expected because of third party damage to our overhead line network, and our team are now working to get the power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by midday . We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 9:31am on the 11th November 2020.
